title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 461.3 - Accounting period
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 461.3 - Accounting period

State Regulations

Each utility shall keep its books on a monthly basis, so
that for each month all transactions applicable thereto, as nearly as may be
ascertained, shall be entered in the books of the utility. A trial balance
shall be taken after the monthly postings have been made, and each utility
shall close its books at the end of each calendar year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
461.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
